benchmarks

benchmarks.Dubins module

class benchmarks.Dubins.Dubins(args)[source]

Bases: object

Dubin’s vehicle benchmark, with a 4D state space and a 2D control input space.

set_model(args)[source]

Set model parameters.

Parameters:

args – Arguments object.

set_spec()[source]

Set the abstraction parameters and the reach-avoid specification.

step(state, action, noise)[source]

Make a step under the dynamics.

Parameters:

  • state – Current state.

  • action – Control input that is executed.

  • noise – Realization of the stochastic process noise.

Returns:

Next state.

step_set(state_min, state_max, action_min, action_max)[source]

Compute the forward reachable set for the box of states [state_min, state_max] under the control input [action_min, action_max].

Parameters:

  • state_min – Lower bound state.

  • state_max – Upper bound state.

  • action_min – Lower bound control input.

  • action_max – Upper bound control input.

Returns:

Forward reachable set represented as a box.

benchmarks.Dubins_small module

class benchmarks.Dubins_small.Dubins_small(args)[source]

Bases: object

Simplified version of the Dubin’s vehicle benchmark, with a 3D state space and a 2D control input space.

Set the abstraction parameters and the reach-avoid specification.

Make a step under the dynamics.

Parameters:

  • state – Current state.

  • action – Control input that is executed.

  • noise – Realization of the stochastic process noise.

Returns:

Next state.

step_set(state_min, state_max, action_min, action_max)[source]

Compute the forward reachable set for the box of states [state_min, state_max] under the control input [action_min, action_max].

Parameters:

  • state_min – Lower bound state.

  • state_max – Upper bound state.

  • action_min – Lower bound control input.

  • action_max – Upper bound control input.

Returns:

Forward reachable set represented as a box.
